Parameters
activities
IList<Activity> IList(Of Activity)

Properties

Activities Activities

Edit

Activities that belong to the pipeline.

public IList<Activity> Activities { get; set; }Public Property Activities As IList(Of Activity)
Value
IList<Activity> IList(Of Activity)

Datasets Datasets

Edit

Optional. List of datasets to be used by activities defined in the pipeline. This can be used to define datasets that are specific to this pipeline and not defined within the datafactory. Datasets defined within this pipeline can only be used by this pipeline and cannot be shared.

public IList<Dataset> Datasets { get; set; }Public Property Datasets As IList(Of Dataset)
Value
IList<Dataset> IList(Of Dataset)

Description Description

Edit

Pipeline description.

public string Description { get; set; }Public Property Description As String
Value
String String

End End

Edit

The end time of the pipeline. The start and end time can both be empty to create a pipeline; they must both have values to set an active period for the pipeline and one cannot have a value if the other does not.

public DateTime? End { get; set; }Public Property End As Date?
Value
Nullable<DateTime> Nullable(Of DateTime)

ErrorMessage ErrorMessage

Edit

Error in processing pipeline request.

public string ErrorMessage { get; set; }Public Property ErrorMessage As String
Value
String String

ExpirationTime ExpirationTime

Edit

Optional. Duration of time after creation for which the pipeline is valid and should remain provisioned. The pipeline will be deleted automatically once it reaches the expiration time if it does not have any active or pending runs 

public TimeSpan? ExpirationTime { get; set; }Public Property ExpirationTime As TimeSpan?
Value
Nullable<TimeSpan> Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

HubName HubName

Edit

The name of the Hub that this pipeline belongs to.

public string HubName { get; set; }Public Property HubName As String
Value
String String

IsPaused IsPaused

Edit

The status of the pipeline. Pipeline is paused when boolean is set to true.

public bool ? IsPaused { get; set; }Public Property IsPaused As Boolean?
Value
Nullable<Boolean> Nullable(Of Boolean)

PipelineMode PipelineMode

Edit

Optional. The method of scheduling runs for the pipeline. Must be one of PipelineMode.

public string PipelineMode { get; set; }Public Property PipelineMode As String
Value
String String

ProvisioningState ProvisioningState

Edit

The provisioning state of the pipeline.

public string ProvisioningState { get; set; }Public Property ProvisioningState As String
Value
String String

RuntimeInfo RuntimeInfo

Edit

Pipeline runtime information.

public PipelineRuntimeInfo RuntimeInfo { get; set; }Public Property RuntimeInfo As PipelineRuntimeInfo
Value
PipelineRuntimeInfo PipelineRuntimeInfo

Start Start

Edit

The start time of the pipeline. The start and end time
can both be empty to create a pipeline; they must both have values to set an active period for the pipeline and one cannot have a
value if the other does not. 

public DateTime? Start { get; set; }Public Property Start As Date?
Value
Nullable<DateTime> Nullable(Of DateTime)
